    • postNewCVEs

      @Async public void postNewCVEs(List<CVE> cveList)
      Send CVEs to all discord servers
      Parameters:
      cveList - The CVEs to send

    • getAllServersCveChannels

      public Collection<org.javacord.api.entity.channel.ServerTextChannel> getAllServersCveChannels(Collection<org.javacord.api.entity.server.Server> servers)
      Get cve-news channel of all given servers. Create the text channel if it doesn't exist. Servers in which channels couldn't be fetched nor created will not have its text channel in the collection
      Parameters:
      servers - Servers to get the channels from
      Returns:
      The cve-news channels

    • getServerCveChannel

      public Optional<org.javacord.api.entity.channel.ServerTextChannel> getServerCveChannel(org.javacord.api.entity.server.Server server)
      Get cve-news channel of the given server. Create the text channel if it doesn't exist
      Parameters:
      server - The server to get the channel from
      Returns:
      The cve-news channel. Empty if it couldn't be fetched or created

    • createServerCveChannel

      public Optional<org.javacord.api.entity.channel.ServerTextChannel> createServerCveChannel(org.javacord.api.entity.server.Server server)
      Create a cve-news text channel in the given server. Will create the channel even if one already exist.
      Parameters:
      server - The server in which the channel needs to be created
      Returns:
      The created channel. Empty if it couldn't be created
